QuestData.Title: The Passion of Shen-zin Su
QuestData.Description: <Huo bounces around excitedly, ready to follow you.>$B$B<Master Shang Xi told you to bring Huo to meet him at the Temple of Five Dawns in the center of the island. Your next destination lies before you.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Spirit of Fire to the Temple of Five Dawns.
QuestData.RewardText: $n, you've done very well. Huo, the spirit of fire, is here. The temple flames are reignited. You accomplished the challenge I put before you, and with seeming ease.$B$BThere is a greater purpose in bringing Huo to the temple. It is time that I tell you more of things to come.

Objectives.Objective: Bring the Spirit of Fire to the Temple of Five Dawns
